subject_terms_3: Photography Cathay Building Dhoby Ghaut Sub Zone
physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a tall building in the background. There is a shorter part of the building that extends outwards and into the foreground of the photograph. There is a smaller building with a tiled pitched roof to the right of the photograph. There are trees and greenery at the background and foreground of the photograph.
title_text: Cathay Building, Dhobi Ghaut (Dhoby Ghaut), Singapore Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Tall buildings Dhoby Ghaut (Singapore) Cathay (Organization)
